page.title: 20Government
page.content: The area lies within the Parliamentary division of Penrith and Border and is represented by a Conservative MP. Local government, under Cumbria County Council, is Allerdale District Council In 1985 residents paid a domestic rate of 174.4p in the Â£: 157p levied by Cumbria CC; 21p by Allerdale DC and 1.4p by Caldbeck Parish Council. The North West Water Authority levied a domestic water rate of 12.7p and a sewerage and environmental services rate of 24.4p. The North Western Electricity Board charged 5.81p per unit. Planning approval for changes to buildings or land must be obtained from Allerdale DE & the Lake District Special Planning Board. This record was compiled and edited by 7 members of Calebeck & District WI; 5 of whom have been resident in the area for 30 years or more.
